content: @Eric Huss it's good for backporting now!
@Michael notriddle Howell Don't hesitate to ask us if you don't know a process. There are a lot around ^^'
Yeah, sorry, I didn't mean to be gruff about it :)
That's alright. I apologize for assuming. I've found the spot in the Forge now, that describes how it's done. https://forge.rust-lang.org/release/backporting.html
There's no need to apologize, that's how you learn :)
Note that when we accept a PR for backport, we don't remove the beta-nominated label. The person who ends up backporting the PR removes the nominated label.
